entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
